text: A jumpscare is a way to scare the audience using sudden, loud noises and/or quick visual changes. It is not only used in horror movies, but also in many video games as well. They are often criticized, with people saying it is a cheap and/or lazy way to scare the audience. Category:Horror movies Category:Horror video games Category:Internet culture Category:Internet memes Category:Pranks Category:Tropes
title: Jumpscare
